webscript.description: Returns the set of descendant Type definitions under the specified Type, or all types if one is not specified.

arg.description: if supplied, return the descendants of the specified type, otherwise return all types
if true, include property definitions within each returned type definition
if 1, return only types that are children. if greater than 1, return types that are descendants up to depth levels deep, otherwise if -1, return all descendant types.
